price: Basi hakikuwa kilio chao ilipo wafikia adhabu yetu, isipo kuwa kusema: Hakika sisi tulikuwa wenye kudhulumu.
arabic: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: Basi wakaungama kwa madhambi yao yaliyo waletea msiba wao. Hakuwa hata mmoja katika wao walipo ona adhabu ila alisema, na wakati huo kusema huko hakufai kitu: Hakika sisi tulikuwa tumejidhulumu nafsi zetu kwa maasiya, wala Mwenyezi Mungu hakutudhulumu kwa kutupa adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: famā kāna daʿwāhum idh jāahum basunā illā an qālū innā kunnā ẓālimīna
